snippet.title: F1 24 Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the grid for the season start by pre-ordering EA SPORTS F1® 24 today, arriving May 31 👉 http://x.ea.com/79780 

Be One of the 20 in F1® 24, the official videogame of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship™. Get closer to the grid like never before, challenge the legendary Max Verstappen, and take on the greatest drivers in the world.

F1® 23 players can jump into Time Trial challenges using the all-new Alpine, Haas, McLaren, and Williams 2024 team cars by pre-ordering F1® 24 Champions Edition by May 1st.. 

Get all the F1®️ 24 information here 👉 http://x.ea.com/79780 

The digital-exclusive Champions Edition equips you with two new Formula 1® Icons, 18,000 PitCoin, and an F1® World Bumper Pack featuring resources for single and multiplayer gameplay events. Players will also receive up to three days of early access starting May 28, and all pre-orders come with one bonus VIP Podium Pass. 

Players pre-ordering the Standard Edition will receive 5,000 PitCoin and an F1® World Starter Pack.

Subscribe to @EASPORTSF1 for upcoming F1®️ 24 trailers and news.

Follow all the EA SPORTS F1 social channels 👉 https://linktr.ee/easportsf1
 
https://twitter.com/EASPORTSF1 

https://www.instagram.com/EASPORTSF1
